painting.cnk.star-crossed_lovers.author: Crisp
painting.cnk.vibe_creature.author: Crisp
painting.cnk.lost.author: Crisp
cnk.speak.1: Shadows carve the truth where light cannot reach... carved with a knife of obsidian and bone.
cnk.speak.2: The roots drink deeper than the branches know... what grows beneath is never what blooms above.
cnk.speak.3: A thousand eyes blink shut, but the one that never sleeps already sees your choice.
cnk.speak.4: The knife waits not for flesh, but for truth... carve me open, and you will be shown the way.
cnk.speak.5: You count the stars, blind to the black between them.
cnk.speak.6: The seed that screams is already grown, though you will not hear its flowering.
cnk.speak.7: All threads lead to the loom, yet you are unable to see the hands that move upon it.
cnk.speak.8: Lay me upon the board of butchery and carve deep, that I may teach you what bleeds unseen.
cnk.speak.9: Only obsidian may pierce the veil, its edge reveals the truth that writhes beneath.
cnk.speak.10: Iron clatters, blind and dull... it scrapes the surface, but never the soul.
cnk.meat_guide.hint: Raise me high, and the world will crawl to meet you... yet when the path is spent, lay me upon the altar, and all will bow in silence.
cnk.shrine.1: The way is open... a gate of flesh, a door of thought... all yielding, all undone. It does not come. It arrives.
cnk.dialog.description: A cozy cooking datapack that adds new food, drinks and more!
cnk.dialog.unlock_cookbook.tooltip: Fully unlocks your cookbook, revealing all recipes and ingredients
cnk.dialog.reset_cookbook.tooltip: Fully resets your cookbook, hiding all recipes and ingredients
cnk.dialog.cookbook.confirmation:
Warning! This is irreversible, any current progress in the cookbook will be lost permanently.

Are you sure you wish to continue?
cnk.dialog.settings.toasts.tooltip: Enables or disables the toasts that appear when you pick up a new ingredient or unlock a new recipe
